comments.author: Janne Jalkanen
comments.body: Patch fixes three TCK test cases to make the proper check.

comments.author: Marcel Reutegger
comments.body:
Applied patch in revision: 679300

Thank you for reporting this issue and providing a patch.

description: Multiple tests claim to check whether versioning is supported, but in reality check for locking.  Patch included.
summary: Multiple tests test for locking instead of versioning
